name: Dirt Car Utmost Rally: Drift Hotfoot Racing
name_original: Dirt Car Utmost Rally: Drift Hotfoot Racing
description:
Multiple missions and amazing super-vehicles, with fast and quick racing stunts is waiting for a real daring rider. Get the dream ride, go ahead and win the title. Speed Chasers game is a pack of thrill, amusement, racing, drifting and a lot more pleasure in a single go. Enjoy an endless ride with your competitors, beat them in this race and create a new record of your top lists racing scores. Get in this muscle car and show your extra racing and supercar handling skills now, within a single ride, test your expertise in this driving and drifting car.

Grab the steering wheel, fun crazy car racing in the heart of city has started, boost the energy, fill up the fuel tanks, move to the track smoothly, and then start the rush racing in an endless amazing city environment, make it an awesome ride by keeping an eye in the interior as well as exterior of the car, don’t let any scratch hit the car. Top runway is filled with cars already, you have to find your way in them., chase your dreams, and lift the car from the road, making a race, feet above from break and there you past the obstacle, amazing stunt rider in this car racing and stunt mania game. Car Racing game is an action packed, thrill and driving super-realistic cars game.
